group_1.textLeft: Grrrrrr... The painting, give me the@painting... Stay out of my way...

group_1.textRight: You can't do this! Please stop!
(I used my magic to stop him from attacking,@but I don't know what else I can do.)

group_1.textLeft: Hyah!
Ugh!
He's fine. I hit him with the back of my@sword!
It was a karate chop actually. No weapon.
Are you okay, Mayu?

group_1.textRight: Yes, but what are you two doing here?

group_1.textLeft: Ria and I kept getting attacked by Familiars.
We thought you might be dealing with the@same problem.
We were out looking for you when...
We saw you go into the museum.
It seems we arrived just in time.

group_1.textRight: So that's why. Well, thank you so much.

group_1.narration: Ria and Asuka told me everything@they saw on the way to the museum.
Familiars more active than the day before...@People stealing because of a Witch's Kiss...
And also... People grieving after having@their treasured items stolen from them.

group_1.textRight: Oh no... There's even more victims.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, the Familiars seem to be way more@active than yesterday.
How best to describe it? It's like they're@spiraling out of control.
The more they steal, the more misery they@spread, and the stronger they seem to get.

group_1.textRight: But I thought we defeated the Witch@yesterday?

group_1.textLeft: About that...
I don't think the creature we defeated was@the true Witch.
I think it may have been a Familiar that@had gotten stronger.
It's difficult to explain, but now that I@think back, something felt strange.

group_1.textRight: So the Witch is still out there...
And it's still sending its Familiars after@everyone's belongings?

group_1.textLeft: I'm afraid so.
The Witch probably still has the things it@stole from us.

group_1.textRight: But where could the Witch be?

group_1.textLeft: I don't know.
If we follow a Familiar after it steals@something, it could lead us to it.
But they're way too fast to follow.

group_1.narration: So many people are grieving@over their stolen treasures.

group_1.textLeft: Who cares if I steal it? I want it...@Yes... I want it.

group_1.narration: And there are people forced to steal@because of the Witch's Kiss.
"That's why what's most important@isn't things, it's..."

group_1.textRight: (This must be the reason I saw you in my@dream.)
Ria, Asuka, let's use this as bait.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... Is that a pendant carved out of wood?
[chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
W-wait a second! That's your...
